=================
Runbot Skip Tests
=================

This module will take out "--tests-enable" from all commands given to instances
built by runbot.

Speeds up runbot if the only intention is to do manual browsing tests



Usage
=====

To configure this module, you need to:

#. Go to a repository in the runbot instance
#. Check the `skip tests` field


Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/runbot-addons/issues>`_. In case of trouble, please
check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

Usage
